alert.note: Alert for Anderson; Jessamine; Mercer; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer; Washington; Woodford (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:49PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Spencer, southeastern Shelby, northeastern Nelson, Mercer, Woodford, northwestern Garrard, Anderson, northwestern Marion, northwestern Jessamine, Washington and north central Boyle Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 649 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Shelbyville to 6 miles northwest of Lebanon. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lawrenceburg and Versailles. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Kentucky.

area.areaDesc: Anderson; Jessamine; Mercer; Nelson; Shelby; Spencer; Washington; Woodford
